content: Every Balkan nationalism was based on anti-muslim feeling. It had to be. Romania expelled or killed all muslims from Dobruja. Bulgaria expelled or massacred it's turkish minority. Greece expelled muslims, burned mosques. It is normal for Orthodox Christian peoples to hate Islam.,pic.twitter.com/AOE71hWwCQ
It isn’t normal for serbs to behave like that today, majority of the world agrees too. Shows the population is behind and people are dangerous and tribal. Instability in the Balkans because of serbs

What is the world? Tolerant liberals and social democrats which put up with islamists? Hungarian Prime Minister and Czech President are anti-muslim now. Instability in the Balkans is inherent in it's religious diversity. All former Ottoman lands in Asia and Europe are unstable.
Any place with Catholic Christians, Orthodox Christians and Muslims in one area would eventually destabilize itself.
Not Albania, we inter marry with Christian and Muslim Albanians.
